item.description:
Free Meetup:  2012:  An Awakening

Thursday, Sept. 22 7:00 pm (bring your own snacks)
Followed by discussion (optional)

A galactic alignment that occurs once every 26,000 years is just around the corner. with Gregg Braden, Annabel Burton, Peter Taylor, John Major Jenkins. Explore the mystery of the 2012 prophecy. This film explores how the earth is in the middle of a transformation that will change the way we live our lives forever. Bring water and your own snacks. Please stay for discussion following the movie (optional).

For all program listings see www.AHigherBalance.com.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter door next to H&R Block, go up one flight to 6B. Center is located directly above Starbucks.
item.name: Free movie night: 2012: An Awakening
